title: Keanu Reeves puts on a cosy display with best friend and business partner Alexandra Grant
text:
He is the Hollywood A-lister who has been dubbed the 'internet's boyfriend'.

And Keanu Reeves was the perfect gentleman as he stepped out with his best pal and business partner Alexandra Grant for dinner in Los Angeles recently.

The Speed actor, 55, looked relaxed as he left a restaurant arm-in-arm with his glamorous companion, 46, who is an artist.

Dapper: Keanu Reeves was the perfect gentleman as he stepped out with his best pal and business partner Alexandra Grant for dinner in Los Angeles recently

Showing her affection for her pal, Alexandra was also seen resting her head on Keanu's shoulder as they strolled.

Keanu cut a dapper figure in a black military-style jacket paired with jeans.

Alexandra matched his casual vibe in a black tee, silver necklace and jacket, teamed with jeans.

Keanu collaborated with Alexandra on the books Ode To Happiness and Shadows.

Close: The Speed actor, 55, looked relaxed as he left a restaurant arm-in-arm with his glamorous companion, 46, who is an artist

While Alexandra provided visual art for the volumes - the first released in 2011 and the next five years later - Keanu wrote poetry.

The business partners also have publishing house X Artists’ Books

Keanu definitely has his own plate full with projects, including the wildly anticipated fourth Matrix film, which will see him return to the role of Neo.

Keanu told ET he had already read the script.

'It's very ambitious,' he said. 'As it should be!'

Lana Wachowski will write and direct the movie, and production is set to begin in early 2020.

Lana told Variety: 'Many of the ideas Lilly and I explored 20 years ago about our reality are even more relevant now. I’m very happy to have these characters back in my life and grateful for another chance to work with my brilliant friends'
description: Keanu Reeves was the perfect gentleman as he stepped out with his best pal and business partner Alexandra Grant for dinner in Los Angeles recently.
